Name: Big Bia
About the game: A unique Rogue-Lite strategy adventure game There is no time and space in the world of BIG BIA. Apes and robots may join your adventure. You may go to the ancient forest or you may go to a technology company. In the world of BIG BIA, everyone writes their character on their faces, but you still can’t tell what they will do. In the world of BIG BIA, everything can be treated as food, and it’s no big deal to be eaten. In the world of BIG BIA, you may be kicked to death by your companions. In the world of BIG BIA, Anyone may fall in love with another, no one could tell. In the world of BIG BIA, you may beat someone else’s dad to irritate dad’s dad. In the world of BIG BIA, if you send your companion to the hospital, you may forget to pick him up. In the world of BIG BIA, eating ice watermelon will boost to crit chance. In the world of BIG BIA, most people spin a gatcha before head out. The Big Bang is where the universe starts, and Big Bia can be where your game starts. Future update You can check it on the Universe News.
